attributes.title: REVOLTING!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because, as many fellow fascist americans, i love trump! but as soon as i opened it, bugs began to crawl from the charger port of my phone! i tried to squish them as fast as i could, faster than police squishing black lives, but they kept pouring out! i was disgusted and exited the app immediately. as soon as i did, the bugs crawled back into the phone, but not before one whispered to me â€œthis is all trumps faultâ€  as he crawled back into my phone! overall a bad experience. would not recommend.
